name: Tower Trouble (Broxxar)
description:
An entry for GMTK2020, Tower Trouble is based on the theme "Out Of Control".

Originally I wanted to add deckbuilder like elements and opportunities to recuperate health, but in return difficult to place block cards would be added to your deck. I didn't have time during the 48 hours to explore those ideas— so I hope I do return to this prototype in the future.
